entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in open areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
